name: Trigger Finger (itch) (LLGames)
description:
This is a simple top down shooter game where you play as a someone(you'll just have to think of a name for him yourself) who has to get to the end of a warehouse filled with undead. This game was made for the Indiepocalypse #8 game jam.

Controls:

WASD = Move

Space = Interact

Left click = Shoot
